close.description: Alt label text for an X icon button in alert.

extensionDescription.message: Yntegrearje VPN yn Firefox: slút ljepblêden út, stel websitelokaasjes yn en mear!

back.description: Alternative text attribute for back button.

titleServerList.description: Title for a dialog where users can set the location for a website.

titlePageSettings.description: The header for website specific settings, i.e. exclude a page from VPN.

excludePageFor.description: Setting to exclude a website from VPN.

resetPageSettings.description: Button text to reset all site specific settings.

vpnIsOn.description: Header to signal that VPN connection is enabled.

vpnIsOff.description: Header to signal that VPN connection is disabled.

extensionVpnIsOff.message: Mozilla VPN is noch hieltyd ynskeakele en beskermet de rest fan jo kompjûter.
extensionVpnIsOff.description: Popup subtitle when the extension VPN is off, but the client VPN is on.

vpnOffStatus.description: Label indicating that the VPN is off.

vpnOnStatus.description: Label indicating that the VPN is on.

placeholderSearchWebsites.description: Placeholder text for the search input field to search websites.

tableHeadingWebsite.description: Table heading for the column listing websites.

tableHeadingVpnStatus.description: Table heading for the column indicating whether the VPN is on or off for a website.

headlineNoWebsitePreferences.message: Jo hawwe noch gjin websitefoarkarren ynsteld
headlineNoWebsitePreferences.description: Headline shown when the user hasn’t set any website preferences.

noWebsitePreferencesSubText.message: Mei de Firefox-útwreiding kinne jo Mozilla VPN-beskerming foar in website útskeakelje of in oanpaste lokaasje ynstelle. Besykje hjirfoar in website, iepenje de útwreiding en wurkje de websitefoarkarren by.
noWebsitePreferencesSubText.description: Subtext shown when there are no website preferences set by the user.

altTextRemoveWebsiteButton.description: Alternative text for the button that removes a website rule from the list of preferences.

altTextOpenSettingsPage.description: Alternative text for the button that opens the Extensions Settings page.

searchServer.description: Placeholder for the Input field where users can search the list of servers.

bodySubscribeNow2.message: Wy kinne gjin abonnemint fine dat keppele is oan de account wêrmei’t jo jo oanmeld hawwe yn de Mozilla VPN-app.
bodySubscribeNow2.description: Body of an error message, shown if the user is trying to use the extension without a subscription.

footerSubscribeNow.message: Slút in abonnemint ôf om dizze útwreiding te brûken.
footerSubscribeNow.description: Footer for bodySubscribeNow2, shown if the user is trying to use the extension without a subscription.

btnSubscribeNow.description: Call to action button for users to subscribe to Mozilla VPN.

getHelp.description: Text of a link pointing to a relevant help page.

bodySignedOut.message: Jo binne op dit stuit ôfmeld by de Mozilla VPN-app. Iepenje de app op jo kompjûter en meld jo oan by jo account om de Mozilla VPN-útwreiding foar Firefox te brûken.

headerNeedsUpdate.description: This is the headline of an error panel.

bodyNeedsUpdate2.message: Download en ynstallearje earst de nijste Mozilla VPN-app om dizze útwreiding te brûken.
bodyNeedsUpdate2.description: This is body copy for an error message.

headerInstallMsg.description: Header if a VPN installation was not found.

bodyOpenMsg.message: Iepenje earst de Mozilla VPN-app om de Mozilla VPN-útwreiding foar Firefox te brûken.

bodyInstallMsg.message: Download en ynstallearje earst de Mozilla VPN-app op jo kompjûter om dizze útwreiding te brûken.

bodyInstallMsgFooter.message: Merk op dat Mozilla VPN in betelle abonnemintstsjinst is.

btnDownloadNow.description: This is a call to action button to download the VPN.

useDefaultLocationExplainer.message: Deselde lokaasje as de Mozilla VPN-app dy’t dizze kompjûter beskermet brûke.
useDefaultLocationExplainer.description: Explanation of what “Use default Mozilla VPN Location” means.

bodyUnsupportedOSMessage.message: Op it stuit is de Mozilla VPN-útwreiding allinnich beskikber op Windows-apparaten.

footnoteUnsupportedOSMessage.message: Wy wurkje deroan om ynkoarten stipe foar macOS en Linux te bieden!

websiteProtection.description: A subtitle that is followed by an off icon and the word 'Off'.

learnMore.description: Label of link that leads to SUMO.

onboarding1_body.message: Mei de Firefox-útwreiding kinne jo VPN-beskerming foar spesifike websites útskeakelje wylst jo it ynskeakele hâlde foar de rest.

onboarding2_title.message: Besjoch ferskate websites fan ferskate lokaasjes ôf

onboarding2_body.message: Nijs út Londen. Sport út Sao Paulo. Winkelje fan Tokio út. Stel websitespesifike lokaasjes yn foar personalisearre sneupen.

onboarding3_body.message: Brûk de útwreiding om VPN-beskerming foar Firefox yn te skeakeljen – sels as beskerming foar de rest fan jo kompjûter útskeakele is.

next.description: Label of button to progress to next onboarding panel.

skip.description: Label of button to skip onboarding.

done.description: Label of button in final onboarding panel.

headerReEnableFirefoxProtection.description: Error panel title for when Firefox is an excluded app.

bodyReEnableFirefoxProtection.message: Firefox is op dit stuit in ‘útsûndere app’ yn de Mozilla VPN-tapassing. Iepenje om dizze útwreiding te brûken de tapassing, gean nei Ynstellingen > Utsûndere apps en smyt Firefox fuort.

settingsPageSubtitle.message: Besykje de website en iepenje de Mozilla VPN-útwreiding foar Firefox om websitespesifike foarkaren ta te foegjen of te wizigjen. Stel dernei foarkarren foar de website yn. Jo foarkarren binne allinnich fan tapassing as VPN-beskerming foar Firefox ynskeakele is.

noSignal.description: Indicator text describing the status of the VPN.

unstable.description: Indicator text describing the status of the VPN.

connecting.description: Indicator text describing the status of the VPN.

websiteLocationLabel.description: Aria label for a flag icon representing the location of the VPN server

alert_conflictingProgram.message: In programma op jo kompjûter kin problemen feroarsaakje mei de Mozilla VPN-útwreiding.

alert_conflictingExtensions.message: Oare útwreidingen fersteure mooglik de wurking fan de Mozilla VPN-útwreiding.

telemetry_toggle_text.description: Label for the Telemetry Opt-In toggle

privacy_notice_link_name.description: Used as text of the link in 'telemetry_screen_descr'

first-install-body.message: Om ús te helpen funksjes en prestaasjes te ferbetterjen en problemen fluch op te lossen, kinne jo kieze om de Mozilla VPN-útwreiding ta te stean om gegevens te sammeljen. De gegevens dy’t wy sammelje sille nea oan jo keppele wurde en wy sammelje nea gegevens oer de siden dy’t jo besykje. Gegevenssammeling hat gjin ynfloed op hoe’t de útwreiding wurket.
first-install-body.description: Body copy on the telemetry consent screen

privacyPolicyIntro.message: Folsleine details fan de gegevens dy’t wy sammelje binne beskikber yn ús privacybelied.
privacyPolicyIntro.description: Description of what can be found in the privacy policy. Blurb in the telemetry consent screen.

thankYouForAdding.message: Tank foar it tafoegjen fan de Mozilla VPN-útwreiding
thankYouForAdding.description: Headline on the telemetry consent screen

toContinueToTheExtension.message: Om troch te gean nei de útwreiding, selektearje it Mozilla VPN-logo yn de Firefox-arkbalke.
toContinueToTheExtension.description: Blurb at the bottom of the telemetry consent screen

optionalDataCollection.description: Subtitle on the telemetry consent screen

telemetryListHeader.message: De opsjonele gegevens dy’t wy sammelje omfetsje:
telemetryListHeader.description: Headline for a list describing the type of data collected by the extension

technicalData.message: Technyske gegevens, lykas browserferzje, útwreidingsferzje en flaterdetails, sadat wy flaters effisjint folgje en reparearje kinne.
technicalData.description: Description of technical data, found on telemetry consent screen.

interactionData.message: Ynteraksjegegevens, lykas it oantal websiden útsletten fan VPN-beskerming, it oantal websiden mei in lokaasjefoarkar en hoe faaks beskerming yn- en útskeakele wurdt.
interactionData.description: Description of interaction data, found on the telemetry consent screen.

telemetryOptOutInstructions.message: As jo de Mozilla VPN-útwreiding net tastean wolle gegevens te sammeljen, deselektearje dan it fekje. Jo kinne dizze ynstelling ek op elk momint wizigje yn de útwreiding, ûnder Ynstellingen.
telemetryOptOutInstructions.description: Opt out instructions on the telemetry consent screen

telemetryCheckboxLabel.message: Mozilla tastean technyske en ynteraksjegegevens te sammeljen

telemetrySettingsCheckboxLabel.message: Dizze gegevens helpe ús funksjes en prestaasjes te ferbetterjen. It omfettet gegevens oer jo apparaat, hardwarekonfiguraasje, en hoe’t jo de Mozilla VPN-útwreiding brûke.
telemetrySettingsCheckboxLabel.description: Checkbox label on the settings page

messageSplitTunnelHeader.description: Header that is shown if the current Firefox is affected by Split-Tunneling

messageSplitTunnelBody.message: Firefox is op dit stuit in ‘útsûndere app’ yn de Mozilla VPN-tapassing. Iepenje om dizze útwreiding te brûken de tapassing, gean nei Ynstellingen > Utsûndere apps en smyt Firefox fuort.
messageSplitTunnelBody.description: Helptext body that is shown if the current Firefox is affected by Split-Tunneling

headerSubscriptionNotAvailable.message: Mozilla VPN-abonneminten binne noch net beskikber yn jo lân
headerSubscriptionNotAvailable.description: Header of an Error Screen, shown when the User is in a Country where Mozilla VPN is not offered.

bodySubscriptionNotAvailable.message: Mozilla VPN-abonneminten binne noch net beskikber yn jo lân, mar jo kinne jo op ús wachtlist pleatse om in melding te ûntfangen wannear’t se beskikber komme. As jo al in abonnemint hawwe, gean dan troch.
bodySubscriptionNotAvailable.description: Body of an Error Screen, shown when the User is in a Country where Mozilla VPN is not offered.

btnjoinWaitlist.description: Button Text, shown when the User is in a Country where Mozilla VPN is not offered.

btnContinue.description: Button Text, shown on an Error screen. Clicking it will continue the current flow.
